content: अपूपः [न पूयते विशीर्यते, पू-प. न. ते. <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A small round cake of flour, meal &c. (<ab>Mar.</ab> वडा, घारगा, अनरसा &c.), thicker than ordinary cakes and mixed with sugar and spices; भीमेनातिबलेन मत्स्यभवनेऽपूपा न संघट्टिताः <ls>Pt. 3. 172.</ls> {@--2@} Wheat. {@--3@} Honey-comb.
